scene.title: 真気
scene.text: The sun rose high in the sky, and life returned to Raksha eyes.
He exhaled deeply and slowly. The sound was quiet, but he couldn't miss the ears of Li Sushang as she tilted her head to look at him
scene.dialog: 「You're awake?」
「Yeah, I'm awake.」

motion.img: 奥托-微笑释然-标准-中景

scene.text: The Raksha responded with a forced smile.
Li Sushang opened and closed her mouth several times, finally unable to hold back any longer as she asked.
scene.dialog: 「Hey, do Raksha sleep with their eyes open?」

motion.img: 素裳-欸真的吗-背手-中景

scene.dialog: 「You fell asleep in the middle of our conversation. But your eyes were open, so I was surprised—you didn't react at all when you waved to me」
scene.text: The girl waved her beautiful white hand in front of the Raksha as she spoke.

dialog.p: 「...No, that's because my consciousness has entered 『Void Archives』.
I had a small question, and needed to find the answer from within. Did that worry you? Sorry for worrying so much...」

scene.dialog: 「I have to focus my mind. These catalysts are powerful, but they also come with a certain price for power...」
「『Void Archives』 has great principles hidden behind it, and explorations are always in danger. If you don't focus on something else your consciousness might be swallowed up by『Void Archives』...」

「There's also the third Divine Key of Shicksal, 『Judgment of Shamash』. It has enough power to destroy mountains and seas as well—but it always recoiled when unleashing holy fire; its owner himself would lose his life」

「...The same goes for 『Abyss Flower』, who used it to treat you. Even I can't completely suppress that strange power of yours...I once healed myself with this thing before but as a result there was an aftereffect left behind by the wound—an internal injury in what is commonly called your language」
「Even now, there are times when I get old and young again. That means it'll take me a few dozen days to recover...」
「Internal injuries...?」

motion.img: 素裳-悲伤目下-背手-中景

scene.dialog: （Rejuvenated due to the disturbance in her spirit... I feel like i've heard that name somewhere before.）
scene.text: [em italic]...An omen of a stampede?[/em]

motion.img: 素裳-呆滞刺激-背手-中景

scene.text: A thought flashed through his mind, entering Li Sushang head like a seed of the devil.

text.p: All of a sudden, the emotions that surged toward her pressed down on this girl's heart.
Beneath the momentary surprise, regret and pain was a hopelessly intense bloodlust.
Those who have fallen into demon form should die—
That was a rule my mother and master had insistently taught her since childhood—the Taixuan clan’s mission, especially 『Jizaimon』 with no taboo; the only ironclad law.

scene.text: In an instant, 『Blade Mantra』's true form reaches the boundary of Meikyou Mirror. Her right palm suddenly stretches straight out and instantly takes on a Keiken『Rikuu』 shape in her hand—a demon-warding sword that can crush anything―

motion.img: 奥托-微笑自信-摊手-中景

dialog.p: 「No... it's not that scary. It was just a side effect of the catalyst, you know?
I found a solution to that in 『Void Archives』, too.」

motion.img: 素裳-疲惫无神-普通-中景

scene.text: The Raksha reached out and made an elegant gesture.

motion.img: 素裳-欸真的吗-背手-中景

scene.dialog: 「All I need to do is reverse 『Abyss Flower』's power with the output from back then. It would be difficult for me to control its accuracy, but...[\s]My catalysts were made in imitation, so they're less efficient than the real thing. So I need to do a lot of calculations...」
scene.text: The story of Raksha continued, but the words they used became incomprehensible to Sushang.

dialog.p: 「As long as you're cured, that is fine. Please do not let your mind go out of control...
Besides, I can't even imagine what kind of injury you must have suffered. Can a catalyst be used like that?」

scene.text: The Raksha was somewhat dumbfounded, but he thought for a moment before answering.
scene.dialog: 「I won't tell you.」
「Tch.」
scene.text: The Raksha smiled as he watched her pouting, but at the same time his heart ached.[\s]They had very little in common, but being with this Eastern girl always reminded me of 『Her.』.
[em italic]Yeah, it's been so long since I last saw her...[/em]
[em italic]Kallen...[/em]
The Raksha stared at the dry, mountain-colored sand. He could vaguely see a girl smiling with bright eyes in front of him
scene.dialog: 「Hey, great inventor—」

text.p: That's right. She called him that...[\s]
The girl in my memories is standing with her hands behind it. Her silver hair flutters, blown by the gentle breeze

scene.dialog: 「—You see, I have a wish. Don't laugh at me; you will be the only one who can teach it to her!」

text.p: Her voice still lingered in my ears. It was as if time had stopped at that moment, and I would never be able to move forward again[\s]
However, that was more than thirty years ago.

scene.text: Tears instantly welled up in the Raksha’s eyes.
scene.dialog: 「—Missy.」
scene.text: The Raksha wanted to be immersed in reminiscence, but he forced himself back into the real world.

text.p: Getting away from memories of the past would be far more difficult than fighting Void Archives. But no one could possibly understand that, right?

scene.dialog: 「I've been using my catalysts for the past few days, and it has drained me of all serious energy. Some Shinshu martial arts techniques have a way to communicate their true nature... Can you do that?」

mono.p: When Celestials and Shinshu fought, the Raksha had noticed...[\s]
Deep down, 『Maki』 is a difficult energy to understand but should have been the same thing—there were many differences in how it was used between East and West
In the West, they see seriousness as a plague and are desperate to escape from its contamination.
What’s more, she had developed a variety of techniques to counteract them[\s]
However, the East Asians have accepted and used it.
I'm using it as a power to strengthen myself.
Compared to Shicksal, Shinshu’s technology is definitely lagging behind.
However, his understanding of Majic was better in the East overall.

scene.dialog: 「Ah, that's...」
scene.text: Li Sushang worried and thought.

dialog.p: 「What you're talking about is a feat. The one where your true feelings are transferred to someone else, right?
Just so you know, it's not like our sword fighting spirit is bad.
It's just... different from other martial arts.」

scene.dialog: 「The founder of the Jizaimon is Phoenix. She traveled all over Japan to defeat evil spirits and monsters that bring calamity upon this world, which was why he detested her most when she went berserk!
That's why her martial arts skills never practice seriously.」
「Oh? This is the first time I've heard of that.」
「After all, you're a foreigner. How should I know? Aha!」
scene.text: She didn’t know what had become the urn for this girl's laughter, but Sushang laughed merrily and continued talking.
scene.dialog: 「That's why— Heheh... We don’t train Naikou or Tanda like the other disciples do. Train your body, and make it a real path for you to follow!」

dialog.p: 「Did you know? The so-called 『Congenitor Ichiki』 essence is the vitality of life.
That's all there is to it. Even among the leaves and petals, true spirit can be found anywhere!」

scene.text: The Raksha smiled. From his point of view, Honkai—or 『Maki』 in the East —seemed more appropriate to call it a “destroyed life force” than something synonymous with vitality; but there was no need for him to correct her opinion
scene.dialog: 「Once you've mastered Edge of Taixuan and the shape of a sword, it absorbs true energy from your surroundings to flow into its meridian. It can be used as large or small waves when necessary—or even in narrow streams without restrictions」
「So compared to other martial arts, the power of Taixuan is stronger but we don't have any serious energy stored in Tanda.」
scene.text: Li Sushang spread her arms wide.
scene.dialog: 「That's why I can’t do the trick.」
「However, according to your explanation」
scene.text: The Raksha thought for a moment.
scene.dialog: 「If you can control the flow of internal merit on your own, wouldn't it be possible to absorb true energy from all over this world and channel that into my meridian?」

motion.img: 素裳-欸真的吗-背手-中景

scene.dialog: 「Huh... Yeah, I think so. But it's impossible for me to do that!」
「I'll tell you.」
「You?」
scene.text: Sushang was surprised.
scene.dialog: 「Can you do it?」

dialog.p: 「I need to explain a little more so that we can match your martial arts system.
There was a difference in understanding of seriousness between the East and West, but it didn’t change its nature.」

scene.dialog: 「I have my brain and 『Void Archives』. Once you understand the true nature of Edge of Taixuan, it won't be hard to figure out how he conveys his qi...」
scene.text: Sushang looked at him in surprise, and then suddenly burst out laughing.
scene.dialog: 「I almost couldn't think of anything to say in response. You Raksha... Oh, right! So you guys are only Shicksal? Then it makes sense that they wouldn’t know any martial arts laws at all」

dialog.p: 「Martial arts can't be passed on to outsiders without permission! It is taboo, after all.
If anyone can learn Edge of Taixuan, Shinshu will be thrown into chaos!」

scene.text: The Raksha was somewhat surprised. Indeed, he hadn't expected Shinshu to have such a rule

motion.img: 奥托-微笑释然-标准-中景

scene.dialog: 「...I'm sorry.」
「Huh? I'm not blaming you or anything... You want to heal your internal injuries, too.」
「All right, young lady. I'll rest for another half month or so and adjust my internal effects before curing myself」

mono.p: He may have said that, but he actually had an idea. It was the main body of Divine Key 「Abyss Flower」 who caused his abnormality[\s]
Using replicas to reverse-engineer them is absolutely impossible on my own. In the end, I have no choice but to rely upon a mysterious Eastern martial art after all...

scene.dialog: 「Geez... You're being way too distant. Just pretending is fine, okay?」
scene.text: Li Sushang unconsciously pouted. Her expression was clouded over, and it hurt to watch her go back and forth like that...

Was it because she’d realized that the Raksha had healed her wounds every day, even after exhausting their own power? The girl wanted to help this man[\s]However, 『Taixuan』 is a secret that absolutely must not be shared with the outside world no matter what.
She hesitated for a while, then suddenly stood up.
scene.dialog: 「Let's get going, Raksha. We must not waste any more time!」

motion.img: 奥托-微笑自信-标准-中景

scene.dialog: 「It's probably only about half a day away, so we should be home by tonight. If I can get my horse to run faster...I could ask Master if he would treat you when they see me—if she turns him down then and there ... When that time comes」
scene.text: Sushang thought about it, bit her lip and spoke firmly.
scene.dialog: 「When that time comes, I won’t listen to my master!」
